movies.title: Shaggy & Scooby-Doo Get a Clue!
movies.plot: Adventures of Mystery, Inc. members Shaggy and Scooby-Doo as they solve various crimes around the world with the help of inherited cash and inventions from Shaggy's missing uncle.
movies.simplePlot: Adventures of Mystery, Inc. members Shaggy and Scooby-Doo as they solve various crimes around the world with the help of inherited cash and inventions from Shaggy's missing uncle.

biography.bio: Jim Meskimen is an accomplished actor, improviser and voice artist whose work is well-known to TV and film audiences. He appeared on the British series Whose Line Is It Anyway? (1988) several times, and was a recurring character on The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air (1990) for two seasons. He has worked with director Ron Howard on five of his films, including The Paper (1994), Apollo 13 (1995), Edtv (1999), How the Grinch Stole Christmas (2000) and Frost/Nixon (2008). He has also worked in two films by director Paul Thomas Anderson. A professional artist, Jim exhibits and sells his realist oil paintings. As a designer/cartoonist, he created dozens of characters, weapons and vehicles for the original "Thundercats" animated series. Jim continues to dazzle audiences with his improvisational skills and appears regularly on L.A. stages. Meskimen is married to actress Tamra Meskimen and they have a daughter, Taylor Meskimen. His mother is Golden Globe and Emmy-nominated actress Marion Ross of Happy Days (1974) and the critically-acclaimed series, Brooklyn Bridge (1991).
biography.name: Jim Meskimen

biography.bio: Jeff Bennett was born on October 2, 1962 in Houston, Texas, USA as Jeffrey Glenn Bennett. He is an actor, known for Johnny Bravo (1997), James Bond Jr. (1991) and Enchanted (2007). He has been married to Susan E. Welby since October 8, 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Jeff Bennett

biography.bio: Scott Menville was born on February 12, 1971 in Malibu, California, USA as Scott David Menville. He is known for his work on Teen Titans (2003), Captain Planet and the Planeteers (1990) and Despicable Me (2010).
biography.name: Scott Menville

biography.bio: Frank Welker was born on March 12, 1946 in Denver, Colorado, USA as Franklin Wendell Welker. He is an actor, known for Aladdin (1992), The Real Ghostbusters (1986) and The Smurfs (1981).
biography.name: Frank Welker

biography.bio: Casey Kasem was born on April 27, 1932 in Detroit, Michigan, USA as Kemal Amen Kasem. He was an actor, known for Ghostbusters (1984), La bataille des planètes (1978) and What's New, Scooby-Doo? (2002). He was married to Jean Kasem and Linda Myers. He died on June 15, 2014 in Gig Harbor, Washington, USA.
biography.name: Casey Kasem

episodes.title: Runaway Robi
episodes.plot: Robi makes good on Scooby and Shaggy's request to become their personal super crime fighter agent trainer - in order to get them in super shape to fight super villains. Robi misunderstands a conversation he overheard between Scooby and Shaggy and decides to to leave and find a new life. Dr. Phibes captures Robi and it is up to Scooby and Shaggy to save him!

episodes.title: Don't Get a Big Head
episodes.plot: Dr. Phineus Phibes is convinced that the sole reason he is continually defeated by Scooby and Shaggy is that he is simply not smart enough. Phibes uses a nano-formula that makes him super smart. It is up to Scooby and Shaggy to use "dumb gas" to make Dr. Phibes stupid again.

episodes.title: Zoinks the Wonderdog
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Uncle Albert Alert
episodes.plot: Dr. Phibes has discovered that Albert is actually in deep cover as a member of his evil staff --- and Phibes is determined to find and annihilate him.

episodes.title: Shags to Riches
episodes.plot: Shaggy inherits a fortune from his Uncle Albert; a scientist and inventor who has suddenly disappeared. They stumble upon Uncle Albert's secret lab, where they discover that Uncle Albert is actually hiding from a sinister villain named Dr. Phineus Phibes.

episodes.title: More Fondue, Scooby-Doo
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy are alerted through Uncle Albert and Robi that Dr. Phineus Phibes is planning to use a heat ray to melt a massive glacier on Mount Zeryodelwietzen (the white yodeler) in Switzerland.

episodes.title: High Society Scooby
episodes.plot: When Dr. Phineus Phibes decides to kidnap three world famous inventors from a high society country club awards ceremony -- Scooby and Shaggy put on their fanciest duds and crash the event. After offending everyone they encounter and starting a massive food fight, Scoob and Shag hit the links with their Mystery-Golf Cart and cause even more mayhem, before eventually getting kidnapped in an ice cream truck. Just as Phibes' agents are about to make off with the inventors, Scoob and Shag charge to the rescue. And with the help of a Scooby Snack that makes Scoob magnetic, ...

episodes.title: Party Arty
episodes.plot: Robi goes on the blink during the eve of an all-important mansion housewarming party, forcing Scooby and Shaggy to replace him with a new robot butler.

episodes.title: Smart House
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy intercept KEVIN, an evil, artificially intelligent computer virus - before Dr. Phibes can use him to infect the computer systems of the nation's weapons defense systems.

episodes.title: Lightning Strikes Twice
episodes.plot: From his spaceship lair, Dr. Phineus Phibes attempts to create an electrical storm that will forever envelop Earth. He also decides that the epicenter of the storm is going to be Scooby and Shaggy's mansion.

episodes.title: Don't Feed the Animals
episodes.plot: When Scooby and Shaggy learn that Dr. Phibes is planning to mow down the rain forest to harvest a plant that he believes will make him immortal, the two travel across the world to save the planet.

episodes.title: Mystery of the Missing Mystery Solvers
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy are flattered beyond belief when they are invited to attend the Mystery Solvers of the Millennium Awards. They soon find themselves surrounded by the greatest detectives in modern history and feel decidedly outclassed.

episodes.title: Chefs of Steel
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy travel to New York City to a live taping of their very favorite television show "Chefs of Steel." Our heroes mix pleasure (eating and being part of a live taping) with business (battling evil contestant Chef Suki Sukihari) and his mind control hibachi. After using a technicality in the "Chefs of Steel" rules to vault themselves from audience members to Chefs -- Scooby and Shaggy defeat Chef Sukihari in a head to head competition and destroy his hibachi!

episodes.title: Almost Ghosts
episodes.plot: In a final attempt to nano-power himself, Phibes uses a new version of the formula developed by his agents --- which promptly turns him into a fluffy, saucer eyed kitten.

episodes.title: Pole to Pole
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy enter a race across Greenland, "The Polar Bear 3000," in order to stop Dr. Phibes' evil agents from transporting an Electromagnetic Device, that when detonated, will knock out worldwide telecommunications...

episodes.title: Big Trouble
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy travel into the desert to discover that Dr. Phineus Phibes has built a giant, weaponized robot in his image. Phibes' plan is to merge with the robot and become one with it, making himself all powerful and immortal.

episodes.title: Operation Dog and Hippie Boy
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy head off to Dr. Phibes' lair on information that Phibes has called a meeting of the world's most fiendish fiends.

episodes.title: Shaggy and Scooby World
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Almost Purr-fect
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Inside Job
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy's worst fears come true; Dr. Phineus Phibes has used the silicon nano-compound he stole from their mansion to finally bestow himself with super nano-powers!

episodes.title: Zoinksman
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy track Dr. Phineus Phibes to a volcanic island where their mission is to stop him from rigging the massive volcano to explode.

episodes.title: The Many Faces of Evil
episodes.plot: Dr. Phineus Phibes uses his new found nano-technology to clone himself into a mini-army of evil. Because Scooby eats too many super snacks, he becomes briefly immune to their effects. Without Scooby's super powers, Scoob and Shag are easy pray for Phibes and his gang of clones.

episodes.title: Cruisin' for a Bruisin'
episodes.plot: Phibes and Scooby and Shaggy decide to go on vacations but, as luck would have it, they book trips on the very same Mexican Cruise Line. They call a truce for the duration of the cruise. However, Phibes orders his agents to kill Shaggy and Scooby.

episodes.title: There Is a Doctor in the House
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Super Scary Movie Night
episodes.plot: Scooby and Shaggy settle into their favorite weekly ritual, super scary movie night. But little do they know, the evil Dr. Phineus Phibes is using them as guinea pigs for a new, super evil technology --- a high-tech DVD that projects scary "on screen" characters into reality as living breathing fiends.

episodes.title: Scooby-Dudes
episodes.plot: When Dr. Phibes returns to the ranch that he grew up on, he makes giant, vicious animals like a hissing goat and a baaing bull and a giant turkey. With his new animal friends, he tries to take revenge over wrongs committed to him in his youth. Can Shaggy and Scooby stop him in time?

episodes.title: Scooby-Dudes
episodes.plot: When Dr. Phibes returns to the ranch that he grew up on, he makes giant, vicious animals like a hissing goat and a baaing bull and a giant turkey. With his new animal friends, he tries to take revenge over wrongs committed to him in his youth. Can Shaggy and Scooby stop him in time?
